description:
Replace those old Blaster bite valves with some new ones to make them feel brand new. Or pop them in the repair kit just in case they decide to fail in the middle of your weeklong trip.

  • Made of durable silicone for soft bites for every adventure
  • Fits and replaces all HydraPak bite valves on Reservoirs, SoftFlasks, and UltraFlasks
  • Comes in a pack of 2
name: Hydrapak Reservoir Bite Valve Sheath 2 Pack
